name: pricing-section-tailwind
title: Pricing Section (Tailwind)
description: A pricing section with three plan cards.

files.content:
{
  "plans": [
    {
      "name": "Starter",
      "description": "Perfect for side projects and experiments",
      "monthlyPrice": 0,
      "features": [
        "Up to 3 projects",
        "Basic analytics",
        "48-hour support response",
        "1GB storage"
      ],
      "cta": "Get Started",
      "highlighted": false
    },
    {
      "name": "Pro",
      "description": "For growing teams and businesses",
      "monthlyPrice": 29,
      "features": [
        "Unlimited projects",
        "Advanced analytics",
        "Priority support",
        "100GB storage",
        "Custom domains",
        "Team collaboration"
      ],
      "cta": "Get Started",
      "highlighted": true,
      "badge": "Most Popular"
    },
    {
      "name": "Enterprise",
      "description": "For large-scale operations",
      "monthlyPrice": 99,
      "features": [
        "Everything in Pro",
        "Dedicated support",
        "Custom integrations",
        "Unlimited storage",
        "SSO & SAML",
        "SLA guarantee",
        "Audit logs"
      ],
      "cta": "Contact Sales",
      "highlighted": false
    }
  ]
}
